subject: Private and Sectarian Schools
Women and Girls
Interscholastic Athletics
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The policy, by the Roman Catholic Diocese of Harrisburg, said that boys’ and girls’ competing together in such sports would be in conflict with its religious mission.
snippet: The policy, by the Roman Catholic Diocese of Harrisburg, said that boys’ and girls’ competing together in such sports would be in conflict with its religious mission.
